thread.title: Computer glitch forces United Airlines to ground all flights Wednesday morning (Video)
thread.title_full: Computer glitch forces United Airlines to ground all flights Wednesday morning (Video)

author: Ben Miller
title: Computer glitch forces United Airlines to ground all flights Wednesday morning (Video)
text: Courtesy Denver International Airport United Airlines flights at DIA Wednesday morning were halted by a "network connectivityâ€¦ more United Airlines , the largest carrier at Denver International Airport , experienced a computer glitch this morning that grounded all of its outbound flights. The glitch, United explained on Twitter, was "a network connectivity issue. We are working to resolve and apologize for any inconvenience." The stop affected an undetermined number of United flights trying to leave DIA this morning. Travelers on the FlyerTalk message board indicated that flight stoppage began around 4:45 a.m. (Mountain Time) and affected United's mainline flights and not its subcarriers. Home of the Day
